solution_line_template: Since the total cost is ${total_cost_given} then {coefficient_total_cost}x = ${total_cost_given} therefore x = ${total_cost_given} / {coefficient_total_cost} = ${pencil_cost}
One pen is equal to {multiplier_pen_vs_pencil} * x which is {multiplier_pen_vs_pencil} * ${pencil_cost} = ${pen_cost}
